org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.systems.imu

Class IMUSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.systems.base.System
      • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.systems.imu.IMUSystem

  • public class IMUSystem
extends System
    Creates an IMU system that handles the angle and movement of the robot through a gyroscope.
